ORM and Query/Model Behavior Bugs.description: Issues in Django ORM related to query composition, ordering, relations, inheritance, and expression handling.

Forms and Formsets Behavior and Renderin.description: Problems and enhancements related to forms, formsets, validation messages, and rendering.

Admin and Autocomplete Features.description: Admin site bugs and enhancements including inline defaults, autocomplete responses, context, and auth admin links.

HTTP and URL Handling.description: Parsing and handling of HTTP headers and URL routing/view parameter issues.

Migrations and Schema Operations.description: Bugs in migration generation and execution, including operations conflicts and code generation.

Developer Tooling (CLI, Devserver, Intro.description: Issues in developer tools such as management commands, dbshell, startapp, inspectdb, and autoreloader.

Security and Authentication.description: Security-related issues and authentication flows, including settings sanitization and password reset tokens.

Testing Framework and Transactions.description: Test case and database transaction/rollback issues in the test framework.

Core Utilities, System Checks, and Suppo.description: Core helpers and checks including decorators, LazyObject behavior, configuration validation, template utilities, and messages storage.

Miscellaneous and Less Common Frameworks.description: Tasks that don't fit well into other clusters, e.g., syndication framework enhancement.
